Tomoca (edekwara TO.MO.CA) bụ ụlọ ọrụ kọfị ezinụlọ nwere na Addis Ababa, Etiopia
E hiwere ya na February 1953. A maara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maka ụdị kọfị Italian ya nke e ji agwa arabica nke Etiopia mee.
Aha ahụ sitere na Italian Torrefazione Moderna Café ma ọ bụ "Modern coffee roasting".
Tomoca bụ onye otu Ethiopia Commodity Exchange, na ọ na-ebupụ kọfị ya na Sweden, Germany, United States, Japan, na obodo ndị ọzọ.. Onye na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ Wondwossen Meshesha, onye njikwa ọrụ.
Tomoca nwere alaka 22 na Addis Ababa ma mepee alaka mba ụwa mbụ ya na Tokyo na 2015. Na Septemba 2020, Tomoca meghere ụlọ ahịa kọfị mbụ ya n'Africa na Two Rivers Mall na Nairobi, Kenya.
